function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reuse of disposable isolation gowns","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to contamination","Mitigation":"Ensure proper disposal of gowns after single use","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Employees, healthcare workers","Owner":"Management, healthcare facility administrators"},{"Description":"Inadequate protection for employees in high-risk areas","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for employees","Mitigation":"Provide appropriate protective equipment and implement strict infection control measures","Technologies":"Isolation gowns, face masks, hand hygiene stations","People":"Employees, healthcare workers","Owner":"Management, healthcare facility administrators"}]}
